The Combat Simulator Project

The package contains binary versions of the main CSP simulation application and several supporting libraries.  The following summarizes the copyright and licensing terms of the various components, with links to the associated websites where the source code can be obtained.  Licenses for data files can be found in the associated directories.  All source code used in this release is also available from the CSP development server (https://zerobar.net/csp/downloads).  Please report any errors or omissions on the forums at http://csp.sf.net/forum.
